# Mexico City

## Overview

Mexico City is the capital and largest city of Mexico, one of the largest cities in the world by population.

## Key Facts

- **Country**: Mexico
- **Founded**: 1325 AD
- **Elevation**: 2,240 meters
- **Area**: 1,485 km²

## Notable Features

Mexico City features the Zócalo, Chapultepec Castle, and sits on the ruins of the Aztec capital Tenochtitlan.
